name: Direct and indirect indicators of invention, knowledge transfer, and innovation used in the report and their sources
description: Direct and indirect indicators of invention, knowledge transfer, and innovation used in the report and their sources

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Direct measures use data that explicitly reflect on the rate, volume, and mix of invention and innovation outputs and knowledge transfer activities. Indirect measures are those that are correlated with these concepts but for which the linkage and impact must be inferred.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics; SRI International. Science and Engineering Indicators
